the crush the sister and the mom. whats next..how is this gonna end

Like I can understand characters like Kirino and that sister in Kaguya-sama who treat their brothers poorly because they're secret brocons and behave the opposite way they want to avoid ostracization. This isn't even that she's disgusted internally about calling him "bro" and even refers to him as "that guy", she can't even believe some girl could love him.

I don't understand why the sister hates the MC so much,  like the only reason given so far is "he's a loser" ie he's not chad but that's not a good reason to this viciously hate anyone much less your brother. No wonder he turned into a rapist, when your own sibling treat you this poorly just because you don't live upto their expectations.  Absolutely kills any sympathy I have for her.
